snippet.title: CARROT : The First Seed | Game Trailer
snippet.description:
“A magical family decides to start a new life in a peaceful small coastal town, but it seems their peaceful days are being interrupted by Greek fire.” 

ChaseFOX's fourth game.

The third installment in the “CARROT” series.

CARROT : The First Seed is a tiny slice-of-life fantasy comedy kinetic visual novel that tells a story of a group of people who lives in a small whimsical coastal town.

est release date Q4 2023

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2392430/CARROT_The_First_Seed/

https://www.patreon.com/chasefoxart
https://chasefoxart.tumblr.com/
https://twitter.com/chasefoxart
